website_summaries.verdict: An integrated, compact horn solution that's loud enough to blast all the other drivers on the road.
pros: 1-piece construction includes horns, compressor, and relay
Louder than an average factory horn
cons: Don't mount horn too close to the ground or water can cause damage
Horn is higher pitched than some prefer

customer_reviews.title: Very loud, yet relatively compact horn solution
customer_reviews.text: Installed this along with it's sister the Hurricane into a Porsche Cayenne to replace the anemic OEM horns. Wired both through an 80A SPDT relay using the original horn wires as the trigger, but supplying current through a 40A resettable breaker on 10 gauge wire. The Tornado is a dual tone horn and the Hurricane a single tone, but on a different sound wavelength so I have ridiculously loud triple tone horn solution that's still relatively compact and installed in the OEM horn positions. Just don't be the person that starts to pull out in front of me or wander into my lane on the interstate or you'll need new pants.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Best horn ever
customer_reviews.text: Over the years many cars have attempted to pull out in front of me while riding my motorcycle. I have had opportunity to use it.OMG what a reaction I got from the other driver. I actually had to pull over because I was laughing so hard. I will never ride any motorcycle with out a Marco tornado.
customer_reviews.author: RW Hensiek

customer_reviews.title: Loud and awesome on my Honda CB1000R
customer_reviews.text: Very loud. Much louder than the factory horn and a much more attention grabbing pitch. It was a direct plug in to my horn wires on my Honda CB1000R. I had to use some zip ties to mount it but you can't see them and it's sturdy. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not All That Loud and Sound Quaility Lacks Guts
customer_reviews.text: Installed on 2013 Hyundai Accent. Louder than the Meep Meep Roadrunner sound, as described by others, of the OEM Hyundai horns; Yes. 'Pants Checker' as described by some; NIMO. Admittedly, this is subjective and I'll update with situational results. Quality sound; NIMO. The sound lacks balls and IMO, the 1970 Cadillac Coupe de Ville horn is a better sounding deep thrusting get out of the way horn. Make no mistake, my goal is not to aimlessly scare anyone; it's to alert the inept they're doing it wrong. I'll update this post with images & sound comparisons.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hochard

customer_reviews.title: Don't look further this is the horn you need
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and really loud. The next time somebody cuts me off in my RV I can't wait to use the horn to let them know I'm here.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Erratt

customer_reviews.title: Poor assembly at manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: So I REALLY wanted to like this horn. Right from the start, there were defects in the assembly of the device. It rattled while riding my motorcycle so bad, that I could hear the rattling over my pipes. (Ok, I can overlook that. Gorilla Tape. Rattle gone). Let than a month later, the horn literally came apart while I was riding. Just completely blew my mind. Now I have to buy a new horn!!!!!😡 Other than actual craftsmanship; the horn was extremely loud which is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Man of Steel

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, easier to install than regular air horns!!
customer_reviews.text: Installed today, pretty straight forward-unit is slightly larger than a regular horn. Very loud! The sound could be best described as a low tone European sound. Definitely has the attention getting note of an air horn, but in a very compact unit. Will update if I have any issues. Low amperage draw as evidenced by not having to use relay provided for use on my early 80's camaro. Sob is loud. Look forward to using it!
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Seems good so far; will update later on.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed on 12/15/19. Factory horn inop and wanted a good replacement. Wired directly onto factory terminal ends with no additional relay or wiring (comes with 30A 4-prong plug-style relay). I squeezed it into spot where factory horn was mounted (2011 Wrangler JKU, so between radiator, driver-side headlight, and windshield washer fluid reservoir). Seems pretty loud so far but I’ll update this as I go along, good or bad. Also, gonna need to upgrade factory 10A mini-blade fuse to at least 20A. It clicks and vibrates a split second when I arm the alarm via key fob, I guess because it needs longer electrical discharge time to activate. Tried panic button; loud, so good. Stay tuned for updates.
customer_reviews.author: Guarddog255

customer_reviews.title: World's Loudest Guzzi
customer_reviews.text: Figured out how and where to install the horn and it looked factory. people must understand the horn draws 18 amp that means 14 Gauge wire to power it directly from the battery through the relay. Do not use the horn wiring that comes on a motorcycle. Use the factory horn power wired to trigger your relay not the horn and make sure you have a fully charged battery. When done properly according to the instructions it is the loudest horn on the road for a 2 or 4 wheel vehicle. I highly recommend it if you really want to get another drivers attention.
customer_reviews.author: Watch-A-Holic

customer_reviews.title: nice and loud
customer_reviews.text: if you have a small car and people in trucks don't see you on the road, you should get one of these. Fairly easy to install. You might need to install a relay if your fuse is not strong enough (Honda Civic needed a relay, Mazda Miata did not). Definitely helps to get peoples attention if they're about to plough into you. Only downside is that now you sound angry anytime you hit the horn - even if you mean to politely honk (say, someone left their coffee mug on top of their car) to get their attention, you're now blasting them with 110 db.
customer_reviews.author: SJI

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, compact but very functional and loud.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this (and a relay) to replace the wimpy factory horn on my sports car. Installation was easy following the instructions and like I mentioned, get the relay. It didi not fit where the factory horn was, but the size also made it easy to locate on a different part of the front of the car (behind the grill). The other reviewers were right ..... It grabs attention!! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: STS9292

customer_reviews.title: Louder than stock, quieter than I want
customer_reviews.text: This IS a loud horn, for a small size it's much louder than my stock 2012 Jeep horn, but if you're looking for something that sounds like a semi, this is not it. Still for the small size it's better than what I had. As long as it lasts I will be happy. Installation is easy if you have a mounting point that's convenient, but that's really application specific and no fault of this product IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Birling

customer_reviews.title: This is hands-down the best horn money can buy without purchasing a full-blown air kit.
customer_reviews.text: After almost being hit many many times while driving, I finally decided to upgrade my horn so I could be more easily heard. I tried an electronic air horn first and didn't like how quiet it still was so I ended up returning and searching some more. I finally found this horn online and gave it a try. It has to be one of the best purchases I've ever made. I connected it to the wiring of the original horn (which I removed), secured it to the car and tested it. It was the loudest horn I've ever heard and easily gets people's attention if needed. I will absolutely purchase another one of these when I get a new car.
customer_reviews.author: Ant S

customer_reviews.title: Loud but not as deep as I'd hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty Fkn loud. Enough to piss off neighbors when testing after installation. However the sound isnt as throaty as I'd hoped for- definitely not a train horn sound... more high pitched but does the trick for letting people know they screwed up
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Be heard on the road.
customer_reviews.text: I live in country and travel many miles on two lane roads. My trucks horn was not loud enough. I added this super loud horn to my truck. Now folks take notice when I sound my horn. I liked how easy the installation was for the horn. It is very compact design made it easy to mount behind the grill. Very pleased with the horn.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this horn!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this horn! Driving in crazy Los Angeles traffic with my little Honda horn wasn't cutting it. I've lost count of the times I've nearly been side swiped even with laying on the horn. People just don't hear the factory horn. I haven't had the opportunity to really use it yet but I have no doubt they'll hear this one coming!
customer_reviews.author: mjo41232

customer_reviews.title: I installed this on my Smart Car after almost being creamed by a tractor trailer
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my Smart Car after almost being creamed by a tractor trailer. The OEM horns from the factory are a joke. These units are easy to install and are very loud. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Noe Longoria

customer_reviews.title: WOW it works great
customer_reviews.text: Hid it behind my front license plate holder, used a relay, so that I can turn it on or off, used my normal horn as a signal wire. Mounted on a 2017 F250 Super Duty. AWESOME. I have a regular horn and then the added horn in traffic. Blowing them No-Driving texters away!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schriber

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and compact which is important for me since almost no space available. We measured the decibles and the difference between the stock horn and this horn was 20 decibels. 20 decibles is a big noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael M Santana

customer_reviews.title: Wow horn beep
customer_reviews.text: This horn is so good. I know nothing about cars and had a friend install it. It was so easy he didn't even charge me. Literally plug and play. It's disgusting how loud this is. It echos blocks away. I love it so much
customer_reviews.author: MitchTheCrane

customer_reviews.title: MY EARS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not test in the garage!!! This is just insane. I was planning on having this hooked up to the regular horn, so both would sound at the same time ... NOPE! This is going to live on a dedicated RED button.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Safer

customer_reviews.title: Not very loud
customer_reviews.text: It definitely took some thinking but wiring wasnt too bad. As far as loudness goes...my stock 2017 f350 is much louder. I was hoping this would be louder but its still cool to have a train horn sound with something this cheap and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: dylan foster

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy, nice loud horn.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sounding very loud horn. It is a nice dual tone. The horn is fairly heavy for ''it's size & seems very well made. It comes with a relay, all you need to do is wire it. I love it!! I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer cadman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Miami traffic since they won't let me have a flamethrower.
customer_reviews.author: Out Of Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Product was not as described. Will not work on ALL 12v battery systems and motorcycles. The horn requires 20 amps of power, which is more then the battery output or the fuse limit on my dual-sport motorcycle. The product is probably more appropriate for cars due to size and power requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install: 1 bolt and just plug it in.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh what an improvement to my stock horn. There’s nothing around that sounds like it. And man it’s loud. Reminds me of the German polizei horns.
customer_reviews.author: Chad S

customer_reviews.title: Loud and not to be ignored!
customer_reviews.text: Put a BlueOx Tow bar base plate on my Ford Focus. I had to remount the right hand horn. The horn turned upside down and filled with water. I purchased this hore to replace the stock "bad" horn. I am very happy with the sound. It is quite loud and will not be ignored. Has a very European sound to it.
customer_reviews.author: FatMuscle

customer_reviews.title: Reliability!
customer_reviews.text: Horn is Rock Solid! I used to have a Screaming Banshee; got wet and fried... Tornado is much simpler design and less failures. Relay supplied w/kit works great. 2010 BMW R1200GS.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Reynols

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what i expected
customer_reviews.text: Delivered when expected, installation was no problem. Horn works ok, its not as loud as I expected and the tone is to high of a pitch than what I was hoping for. Not sure if I will be keeping it or not. On the up side, it does sound better than the old tired factory horn.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Super loud and great
customer_reviews.text: What an upgrade for my Jeep wranger. Mine was a simple plug and play while only have to change the fuse to a 30. Now I sound like a very loud train.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy this again and for a friend
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same as a wiki horn! I’ve had This for a few months and still going strong loud like super loud. And looks great 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Super loud
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem loud in the truck but once heard outside it’s the amazing obnoxious people scaring sound you’re looking for
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Install was easy maybe an offer of a mounting bracket from the seller would be nice. Super loud and now others will hear me when I honk my horn.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Much louder than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Installed Marco Hurricane and Tornado on my Vintage Cub Cadet. Works great, and is LOUD!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a mini train horn. Very aggressive. Had other horns before and this one is the best in my opinion. Great quality. Not Chinese but Italian.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy, this is junk.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 5 months. Now it failed and I get to buy another one. What a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Loud Installed on a Jeep
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to buy a Horn over the internet, but I took my chances and so far it was a great purchase. Installed on a JKU and works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You know it works great when your wife complains it's too loud :-)
customer_reviews.author: aaaPKG

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping animals from chasing you
customer_reviews.text: Works well, loud dual-tone horn. I have found the animals that may like to chase me on my motorcycle decide not to after I tap this thing a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Not that loud
customer_reviews.text: ItS not nearly as loud as what it’s advertised as. Sounds like a dying go cart
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Great Loud Wonderful horn
customer_reviews.text: HOLY COW!!! This horn is very loud, it exceeds my thoughts and is excellent! I feel safer knowing when I need to alert other vehicles they will hear me immediately ! This is a great addition to my bike !
customer_reviews.author: JamesG

customer_reviews.title: Failed after one month.
customer_reviews.text: Failed after one month. Be prepared to fabricate a mounting bracket.
customer_reviews.author: tracy lindsey

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my motorcycle (wasn't that easy), now it sounds like a truck. I like it! Installation wasn't trivial.
customer_reviews.author: TalH

customer_reviews.title: Arrived pretty fast. Install was simple
customer_reviews.text: Arrived pretty fast. Install was simple. Amazingly loud. Just what i needed to get these drivers to pay attention to driving and off there phones.
customer_reviews.author: robert lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for any motorcycle.
customer_reviews.text: Very quick install on my Vulcan 1700. This is extremely loud and will get the attention of anyone nearby!
customer_reviews.author: Woodsman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!..
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is an awesome horn!!.. I replaced the horn in a 3500 series dual axle sprinter for this. There a huge difference!!.. Other cars hear and see me for sure now!.
customer_reviews.author: lewis flores

customer_reviews.title: Best that money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best that money can buy! Also, I like to say, great customer service because I had a defected product on my first horn, and it was super easy to return the product, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed on our RV to assist other drivers who fail to notice danger in their driving.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: loud horn, put it on my boat and just had to fabricate something to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: That guy

customer_reviews.title: Yes nice and very loud
customer_reviews.text: Yes nice and very loud. I just had a challenge of putting it on but with a little thought I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldnt buy this, the description is way off!!
customer_reviews.text: Its an over amplified horn is all it is. Sounds NOTHING like a tonado siren AT ALL. very disappointed in it
customer_reviews.author: Wesley P.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless after wet :(
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a month. But be careful though. Installed facing forward so sound directed out, filled with water and now worthless....
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: LOUD! But I was a little disappointed in how high pitched it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Meister

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: This horn is considerably louder than other horns that are the same size and shape. I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: GET OUT OF THE WAY
customer_reviews.text: This sounds identical to the BadBoy but MUCH louder. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Armand Hindrichs

customer_reviews.title: POW
customer_reviews.text: the horn is super loud and sounds just like a semi truck 🚛
customer_reviews.author: Gittyup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent loud attention getting horn
customer_reviews.text: Awsome unit, super easy install, super loud, compared to stock, but don't expect it to be as loud as a triple trumpet train horn with a large compressor and air tank that cost $400-700. For the money you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud high pitch but not supper loud
customer_reviews.text: Its loud but not that impressive. I was under the impressions it was going to be extreamly loud. Just louder than the average horn
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't very pleased, I drive a 2500 diesel truck and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't very pleased , I drive a 2500 diesel truck and this horn sounds like I'm going around the traffic circle in Italy..meep,meep
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Emms

customer_reviews.title: really loud but kinda high pitched for a truck.
customer_reviews.text: It is loud, like really loud. it has a kinda high pitch sound, more like a loud compact car horn than a truck horn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super loud! Easy installation on my wife's Kia Sedona
customer_reviews.text: Super loud! Easy installation on my wife's Kia Sedona, was able to simply replace one of the factory horns. Did not have to install relay or do any special wiring, just hook up power and ground to the horn. A bit high pitched, but a very loud attention getter.
customer_reviews.author: LS Guy MI

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and super loud
customer_reviews.text: Works absolutely great. Installed this on my 1978 VW Superbeetle with the supplied relay. Took about 10 minutes to install and works super well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lundstrom

customer_reviews.title: This thing is loud and small
customer_reviews.text: This worked out really well and loud. Fit in stock horn location on my Vulcan with the addition of a small bracket for support. Must install with relay and own fuses circuit.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Vargas

customer_reviews.title: ... not moving when the light changes will have a great surprise. All bikers need one of these horns
customer_reviews.text: People texting or hopefully applying lipstick and not moving when the light changes will have a great surprise. All bikers need one of these horns. Easy to install and make the noise of a little semi. People not paying attention at a light may have to start wearing Depends.
customer_reviews.author: dan jackson sr

customer_reviews.title: Honestly don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine the first 2 months ... now it sound like a regular cheap horn and of course I can’t return or exchange ... FYI all the wiring is correct no issue there
customer_reviews.author: AZ rider

customer_reviews.title: 2019 HD Street Glide install
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sound of the horn. It's louder than stock on my 2019 HD Street Glide. However it works for a bit, then will stop working. If I shut the bike off and start back, the horn goes back to working. Can't figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Yates E. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Could not find anyone to install it.
customer_reviews.text: Could not find anyone to install it. Took it to 5 different places. Don't for new vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: randymcvey

customer_reviews.title: this 151db horn is only 106db
customer_reviews.text: i bought this horn because it was advertised as a 151db horn and was very dissapointed it only produces 106db. it IS NOT SUPER LOUD!! the sound is nice, though NOT super loud!!!
customer_reviews.author: Benedikt Delesie

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Took my time and installed to get maximum noise level and within first week stopped a truck that was pulling out in front of me
customer_reviews.author: Harold C Campbell

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously loud! perfect for waking people up on the roads easy install and nice and compact
customer_reviews.author: Connor hall

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Much louder than stock horn. People will easily hear you at even interstate speeds like 70+ MPH. Fun to scare friends with too. Quick install, provided nothing is wrong with old wires.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few weeks now....Very loud and never fails. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Studly Muttly

customer_reviews.title: Marco horn
customer_reviews.text: Very high pitch horn. Not as loud as I thought it Would be.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WOULD PURCHASE AGAIN, THANK YOU FOR BEING AS DESCRIBED :)
customer_reviews.author: B L ELLARD

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Loud!!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install and is super loud. Definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Nosredna

customer_reviews.title: Check all solutions before writing and review
customer_reviews.text: Really loud for its price, and noticeable at 65+ mph speeds. No problem with letting people know your there. :) p.s. If you have it hooked up and it's producing a weird sound. Try reversing the wires it worked with me since mine are not labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle s.

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Removed old horn and installed 2 of these horns in less than 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Jeeper

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: love it. hopefully it’ll hold up to being on my four wheeler
customer_reviews.author: F. Brown

customer_reviews.title: worth the money!! I'm buying my kids one
customer_reviews.text: Oh it's loud! A little on the high pitch side but loud. Easy to install. Only need two wires from your horn. I used saddle clamps and keep my other horns in use
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Best little horn
customer_reviews.text: Best little damn thing I ever bought from Amazon. Loud as hell!!! The instructions are not very good at all!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashaw1811

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound awesome, on my Ural For the 4th of July
customer_reviews.author: Nicasio

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its ok better than stock but not super loud just loud good luck

customer_reviews.title: HONK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wire up and it is very loud. Just what I wanted for my VW Squareback ❤

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and decent price
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other compact air horns but no of them put out as much sound as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Wolfgang

customer_reviews.title: it's loud
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on my Harley, it is loud and instantaneous One bolt to Mount it on the stock bracket plug in the terminals and good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Installaion
customer_reviews.text: No indication that a wiring harness is needed. Installation cost $250.-

customer_reviews.title: Beep, beep not Honk, Honk.
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to put in my Jeep and wasn’t as loud as they say.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Stout

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. Two-year warranty
customer_reviews.text: Alot louder than stebel air horn. Relay a must! Draws 20 amps at 12v with an output of 112db at 2 meters as per Marco website. Very happy. Two-year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: fltundra

customer_reviews.title: Sounds different
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing this horn on my truck it's decently loud and easy to install but is a bit high pitched for my taste

customer_reviews.title: Good horn
customer_reviews.text: Loud horn, at least it will get other ideots attention.
customer_reviews.author: Rus in Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Defective relay
customer_reviews.text: Relay that was provided with the horn was stuck in the closed position. With the relay stuck closed, the horn is powered on at all times and won't stop honking. It's very loud and the only way to stop it was by pulling the fuse. I had already removed my stock horn, so I couldn't legally operate my vehicle while waiting for a new relay. I was forced to buy a new relay from the local auto parts store, costing me more money. Reading other reviews, this doesn't appear to be a consistent problem, but buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: CBRdream

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HORN FANTASTIC SELLER!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super horn, you WILL be surprised by the sound level, especially for such a small package. And this seller is FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. It mounted right up with the OEM mount no problems. Very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Horn... Just as advertised!... Very loud... The only negative is installation... In-line fuse and necessary wiring is not included.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a sick chicken on steroids
customer_reviews.text: Not very loud. Sounds like a sick chicken on steroids.
customer_reviews.author: Aldine Diller

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for bikers!
customer_reviews.text: Loud and easy to connect, a little bit more difficult to mount.

customer_reviews.title: loud
customer_reviews.text: The confused looks when a jetta is making that sound
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the stock horn on a VW GTI. WOW what a difference! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rodwell Johnson II

customer_reviews.title: Very loud!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I mounted it right up to my motorcycle and it is very loud!!
customer_reviews.author: Conner Hale

customer_reviews.title: Anything is better than made in China
customer_reviews.text: VERY LOUD! Made in Italy. Anything is better than made in China. They only make junk! It works great, so far. Installing it was a challenge. Not that there was any problem with the horn itself. They cram so much under the hood on cars today, it is hard to find a place to put it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S.

product_meta.title: SUPER LOUD MARCO TORNADO Compact Air Horn for ALL 12V Vehicles: Motorcycles, Cars, & Trucks
